resources.string:
1. Learn Java/Kotlin and XML: Basics of coding and UI design.
 2. Master Android Studio: Familiarize with the IDE and fundamentals.
 3. Study Material Design: Follow Google Ui Ux guidelines.
 4. Explore Advanced Components: RecyclerView ViewModel LiveData and Navigation.
 5. Utilize Libraries: Jetpack Compose, Retrofit, Glide, and Lottie.
 6. Practice and Stay Updated: Build projects and engage with the developerÂ community.
